questions.question: The first IPL final in 2008 was won by Rajasthan Royals against Chennai Super Kings.
Mumbai Indians have won all their IPL finals against Chennai Super Kings.
The 2019 IPL final was decided by a Super Over between Mumbai Indians and Chennai Super Kings.
Chennai Super Kings has the record for most IPL final appearances (10 as of 2023).
The 2020 IPL final between Mumbai Indians and Delhi Capitals was played in Dubai.
Kolkata Knight Riders won their first IPL title by defeating Chennai Super Kings in the final.
David Warner captained Sunrisers Hyderabad to their maiden IPL title in 2016.
The highest team total in an IPL final is 214/5 by Mumbai Indians in 2020.
MS Dhoni has won the most IPL finals as captain (5 titles).
Gujarat Titans defeated Rajasthan Royals in the 2022 IPL final to win their first title.
